---
title: Utf8Marshal.StringToHGlobalUtf8 method
---

Converts a value to an UTF-8 string, in native memory.

```csharp
public static IntPtr StringToHGlobalUtf8(string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The value to encode. |

## Return Value

A pointer to the UTF-8 string in unmanaged memory. You must free this pointer using IntPtr).
